text: Hossein Khatibi (, born 5 January 1975 in Tabriz, East Azerbaijan) is a retired Iranian football player and assistant of Persian Gulf Pro League in the Tabrizian teams such as Tractor, Shahrdari and Machine Sazi. he was top goalscorers in the 1997–98 Azadegan League from the Shahrdari football team.http://www.varzesh3.com/news/25276/ Rasoul Khatibi is his younger brother.http://goaldaily.ir/template1/News.aspx?NID=13869 ==References== ==External links== * * Hosein Khatibi in TeamMelli.com Category:Al-Nasr SC (Kuwait) players Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Iranian footballers Category:Shahrdari Tabriz players Category:Iranian Azerbaijani sportspeople Category:Machine Sazi F.C. players Category:Iran international footballers Category:Tractor S.C. players Category:Pas players Category:Iranian football managers Category:Iranian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Tabriz Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Medalists at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Azadegan League players
title: Hossein Khatibi
